title: Exploring the Ocean
description: In this lesson, students will learn about the ocean, its creatures, and the importance of protecting it. They will connect what they already know about water and animals to discover more about the fascinating world beneath the waves!

prompts.input: Why do you think the ocean is important to our planet?
hints: Think about what the ocean gives us, like air and food.
Consider how the ocean helps different animals and plants live.

prompts.input: How would you describe a creature that lives in the ocean? What special things can it do?
hints: Think about what it looks like and how it moves.
What makes this creature different from animals on land?

subject: Science
